website_summaries.verdict: Bike tubes meant for 20 inch rims found on most children's mountain bikes and recumbents.
pros: Will fit larger mountain bike tires up to 2.125 inches wide
Easy to fit over most bike rims with a little bit of effort
Long lasting and simple to patch in case of a flat
cons: Rubber wears out faster than other tube options

customer_reviews.title: Patchable if necessary
customer_reviews.text: Several decades ago I patched my motorcycle tube. A couple days later, my daughter and I were on my bike going for a 400 mile road trip. About 20 miles into the trip that tire went flat and dumped both of us into a busy intersection. Later, I found out 'you can't patch Chinese tubes'. No known adhesive would hold on their rubber compounds. These tubes are made under a license from Goodyear and are patchable. Now, I hope I never have to, but my grandson will get a puncture (I'm reasonably certain) in one of his bike tires at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Gil Forbes

customer_reviews.title: Buyer be ware!
customer_reviews.text: Trying searching for a bicycle tire or inner tube. When you type in an exact size or model number what comes up is just about everything but the size that you are searching for. I thought I had purchased the correct tube but when it arrived I realized the mistake. Tried to return but amount of refund was going to be less than a forth of what I paid originally. Forget Amazon just go to your local bike shop you will get the correct size and for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: C. Endter

customer_reviews.title: Best value for the money and it is Goodyear!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my son's 20 inches bike. The original tube had a tear so I replaced it with the Goodyear tube. Not only it has the highest number of reviews but it is also inexpensive compares to other brands. As long as it lasts, it gets my 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: K.D.

customer_reviews.title: Good tire tubes
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality tube that was very easy to install. We had so many goat head thorns on our last bike ride with our Thule chariot trailer. The packaging was great and the tube feels durable. We also bought the slime tire liners and hopefully that is the last time we will have flats due to goat head thorns. Be sure to get a set of tire levers to help with the tire removal process.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny C.

customer_reviews.title: Item had hole in it when inflated out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these inner tubes one had a hole in it when I took it out of the box and put air in it to check that it was good, I did not bother to ship it back because I need to have a working tire on the cart that it was used for so I repaired the hole and so far it is still holding, So check these inner tubes before you install them in your tire.
customer_reviews.author: C T

customer_reviews.title: Defective-thin spot failed.
customer_reviews.text: Had a visible thin spot at a casting line that failed at 30 PSI. I took out the tube and saw that a split developed in the center of the thin spot, causing the leak.
customer_reviews.author: retcc1

customer_reviews.title: It's a tube.
customer_reviews.text: First had a problem with inital leak. Removed tube and now no leak after 3 days. Going back to bike store from now on. They sell you the tubes they install. Problem? Ask them. Amazon problem? Nobody to call. Still live prime.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Conway

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly on the bike 20*1.95
customer_reviews.text: I got this tube to replace on my old bike broken tube(*cant patch anymore). The tube quality is good, no leaking at all. It comes with a small box and well packed. My kid just need this one to continue a bike trip. Installation without hassle and the price is just right.
customer_reviews.author: Ocean

customer_reviews.title: Fixed the kids bike rear tire
customer_reviews.text: It worked. Took me about 10 minutes to replace the tube. It’s been about a month now. I did notice it requires more frequent inflation than the original tire tubes (I pump this tire every other week) Not sure if it is expected.
customer_reviews.author: Tools. Electro. DIY

customer_reviews.title: Go with this brand, you won't regret it
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box you can definitely tell that the inner tube is thicker than other brands. Make sure not to inflate more than what your bike calls for. I had the mistake of over-inflating and within a couple of days the tire ended up Popping.
customer_reviews.author: jorge

customer_reviews.title: Much more cost efficient than paying a store to change it
customer_reviews.text: If its your first time changing an inner tube, check out a quick video online to see how. Once you know the steps, which are super simple, its easy, just make sure you have the air valve lined up, most importantly. Once you know what to do, its super easy to change out!!
customer_reviews.author: CReg702

customer_reviews.title: Arrives quickly and is a value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great value for a wonderful product which I am always looking for. Did not have to run to the store just waited till the next day when Amazon delivered it.
customer_reviews.author: BonnieW

customer_reviews.title: Went flat almost immediately.
customer_reviews.text: Total waste. Installed on bicycle. Was flat, completely flat within 2 minutes. Will need to be patched to use it. So disappointed. Said would take 2 weeks to come. Took a month.
customer_reviews.author: V. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Cheapest I could find at short notice
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure these are all the same. It was well made and didn't have any leaks, so no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Culloty

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't inflate right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Seems like the valve was broken or issues right out of the box. Now, returns you have to take to Kohls or pay. Yeah, for 4 bucks, skip that. Pick another tube.
customer_reviews.author: MNPilot

customer_reviews.title: not a good product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my sons bike and when we opened the package it appeared to be used! the valve looked corroded and old. Finally the tube had slits in it and did not hold air, not sure if it was just old or if it was defective, but the price is too good to be true!
customer_reviews.author: Len F

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good tube! Son is happy with them. He has had a lot of tubes! Good value!!
customer_reviews.author: theresa iler

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: The shipment arrived in time. Packaging was basic but sufficient not to damage the box. The tube when opened appeared in good shape. Installation was easy and the tube/tire held up the air pressure for the last few weeks. No complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: A. R.

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: i used it to replace my son's bike's front innertube, perfect. Tried to buy a spare one, unfortunately its all sold out!
customer_reviews.author: David T.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your money
customer_reviews.text: Went through 3-4 tubes in one day. I thought since the tubes were Goodyear they’d last a little while. My boys are bmx riders and I’m used to replacing tubes but this was ridiculous. I won’t buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These things are Fragile and not durable, unfortunately, making goodyear brand look bad
customer_reviews.text: These things are Fragile and not durable, unfortunately, making goodyear brand look bad. i have gone thru so many patch kits, and 4 different tires, really unreliable, looking to move to another brand
customer_reviews.author: neil voskoboynikov

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for repairing my daughters bike. Easy to install and inflate. I used screw drivers to access the tire and install it. But you might want to also buy a kit for replacing inner-tubes.
customer_reviews.author: DannyBoy

customer_reviews.title: Don't get distracted. Make sure you test immediately and return ASAP.
customer_reviews.text: The product is nice, however; of the two inner tubes, one leaks all of the air in less than 24 hours. I'm believe it is just a singular defective item. Unfortunately, it is installed on the rear tire (more work to remove) and I'm past my time to return for replacement.
customer_reviews.author: christina anderson

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping, great products..
customer_reviews.text: I always buy Goodyear tires and tubes , garden hoses my favorite is the gorilla hose ..over 300psi ..!
customer_reviews.author: Santa Cruz

customer_reviews.title: This product sucks
customer_reviews.text: This brand is junk. Purchased two, one as a repair and one as a backup. Both has pinhole leaks and tire was flat within an hour. Read similar reviews saying the same thing but I figured Goodyear would be a good brand but not for bikes. Stay away from this.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Works Great -- Instructions Unclear
customer_reviews.text: The tube worked perfect. The only issue was there were no clear instructions on how to properly install this tube. I was able to figure it out, but I did it wrong at first and had to do it over again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: ame back with a hole in it... they exchanged the item
customer_reviews.text: ame back with a hole in it... they exchanged the item
customer_reviews.author: Arik Goldshmid

customer_reviews.title: 2 tubes both leaked
customer_reviews.text: Both tube's from daughter's bike went flat. Both developed slow leaks. Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Durability is poor
customer_reviews.text: Finally installed my son's tube on his bike and while pumping air in it, it popped. Now I have to buy another one. He didn't even get to ride his bike. I wish these were more durable being a Goodyear tube, im disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: REY2517

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Seems great so far. My son bought a bike at a thrift store, and shortly thereafter one of the tires got popped. This was a great replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Neville

customer_reviews.title: Regular tube, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected, great price. Good valve, holding air fine.
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: It's a tube
customer_reviews.text: I put the tube inside the tire, pumped it up, and now it holds air.
customer_reviews.author: Brad D.

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: Good so far. Used it for about a month and it seems to be working. I bike mostly on pavement and I don't run over things so I normally don't experience holes. It's a good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C.

customer_reviews.title: Right  product!!!!!!!!@
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 20" tubes!!!!! I have worthless 26" tubes😡 i called and got such a runaround!! Was a regular customer now u got pa and i got nothing except tubes that are 6 inches to big😡i was a regular customer!
customer_reviews.author: jeff watson

customer_reviews.title: went burst at 30 PSI
customer_reviews.text: it said inflate to the tyre stated limit which was 40 PSI. It burst at 30 PSI!! All the hardwork of changing the tyre gone waste.
customer_reviews.author: Pooja

customer_reviews.title: Tubes burst when pumping - beware.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two tubes and unfortunately both burst when pumping them with air. Poor quality rubber? Not sure the Goodyear brand stands for durability!
customer_reviews.author: Puneet Sapra

customer_reviews.title: Direct replacement
customer_reviews.text: Exact replacement for my sons bicycle. back to riding around in no time with quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not very reliable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sons bike and within two days he had another flat tire.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: 🚴‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: I put it on my bike (under the tire) and pumped air into it. Works. 🚴‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: venkman

customer_reviews.title: No maximum psi listed
customer_reviews.text: This innertube popped when I inflated it to 40 psi. Disappointed. Box says "do not overinflate" but does not list a maximum
customer_reviews.author: R. Smoker

customer_reviews.title: Good tube
customer_reviews.text: Works well! 4 year old helped his papa with easy installation, now we’re bacj on the road!
customer_reviews.author: ?growngeek

customer_reviews.title: It works and lasts
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my bike tire and it works and I like it. Price is good and easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Flores

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Installed it and it didn't leak for at least 2 months now. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: TomaPeti

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, I bought 2 for my bike and both had at least 2 holes in them already, really disappointing. Do not buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana G

customer_reviews.title: Goodyear Bicycle Tube
customer_reviews.text: Item shipped on time and fit on the bike perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: worked and came in the condition I expected. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Jubin Pejman

customer_reviews.title: Low quality tube blows up
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably low quality. I bought 2 tubes and both blew up within 1 hour.
customer_reviews.author: Vlad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i like the quality but i need a better price to keep buying more thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great as a replacement inner tube
customer_reviews.text: Worked great as a replacement inner tube. Only down side is that it was an add on item and I had to wait until I needed something else so it would ship.
customer_reviews.author: VICTORIA R.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Valve stem split and tire went flat after riding for two minutes. Very cheap quality and I’ll make sure I’ll never buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Quyen&Mike

customer_reviews.title: Did the job, easy to replace.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and made a used bike new again. Tube was easy to install on bike with the help of a YouTube video.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Well made, good fit. Update, they are holding up well with jumps an curbs.
customer_reviews.author: BDK

customer_reviews.title: As described. Works.
customer_reviews.text: Just the simple innertube. I am hoping the brand means something.
customer_reviews.author: David Bruss

customer_reviews.title: Goodyear more like Perfectyear
customer_reviews.text: Great product and I wouldn't trade it for anything else at that price point!
customer_reviews.author: jose

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold air
customer_reviews.text: Got the tube today and put it in, and will not hold air! Son is really disappointed 😞
customer_reviews.author: Crystal H.

customer_reviews.title: Broken first try
customer_reviews.text: Burst apart as soon as I put air in it
customer_reviews.author: Scott L.

customer_reviews.title: Flat easily along seam
customer_reviews.text: made in china and dont hold air pressure. flat easily
customer_reviews.author: C. Leblanc

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: it doesn't fit my child's 20 inch bike. tube hanging off the rim......
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Horrible every one I revieve wouldn't hold air junk tubes
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: A good choice
customer_reviews.text: Did what it was supposed to do. Fit perfectly and installed easily.
customer_reviews.author: Bayzie Pepper

customer_reviews.title: The tires popped a couple of days after I put ...
customer_reviews.text: The tires popped a couple of days after I put them on my bike. And all I do is ride my bike on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
